Name: LU 376 - Zoning, OXFORD NURSING HOME, Brooklyn, (150361 ZMK)
Title: Resolution disapproving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 150361 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 376).

History.Description: This Resolution was Disapproved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

Attachments.Name: Land Use Calendar - Week of May 16, 2016 - May 20, 2016
Additional Meeting of the Subcommittee on Zoning & Franchises
Additional Land Use Calendar - Week of May 16, 2016 - May 20, 2016

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - May 25, 2016

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Greenfield and Richards\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on May 9, 2016 its decision dated May 9, 2016 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by Conover King Realty, LLC,\expndtw-6  \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section 16a, which in conjunction with the related zoning text amendment, would facilitate the development of a nursing home and an ambulatory diagnostic and treatment facility at 141 Conover Street (Block 555, portion of Lot 5), in the Red Hook neighborhood of Community District 6 in Brooklyn\cf1  \cf0 (ULURP No. C 150361 ZMK), \expndtw-4 Borough of Brooklyn \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 160081 ZRK (Preconsidered L.U. No. 377),  zoning text amendments to Appendix F (Inclusionary Housing Designated Areas and Mandatory Inclusionary Housing Areas) and a related section in Article XII, Chapter 3 (Special Mixed Use District) to apply Inclusionary Housing regulations in Community District 6, Borough of Brooklyn; \par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on May 17, 2016;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration (CEQR No. 15DCP067X) issued on December 14, 2015, (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 160064 ZMX, incorporated by reference herein, the Council disapproves the Decision.\par
\par
Adopted.\par
\par
  \tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on May 25, 2016, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
